description: This file is a test/mock implementation related to 'syscfg' functionality, mocking external dependencies for testing purposes. It includes external headers, declares external variables, and defines C linkage functions that interact with a mock object.

methods.name: int syscfg_init()
methods.description: Initializes the syscfg mock, returning 0 if the mock is not set, otherwise delegating to the mock's syscfg_init method.

methods.name: int syscfg_get(const char * ns,const char * name,char * out_value,int outbufsz)
methods.description: Fetches a configuration value via the syscfg mock, delegating to the mock's syscfg_get method with provided parameters.

ctags.name: syscfg_get
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int syscfg_get(const char *ns, const char *name, char *out_value, int outbufsz) $/
ctags.signature: (const char * ns,const char * name,char * out_value,int outbufsz)
